text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Takeoff!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: ...What's that? A kind of cake?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
"Taking off"... is when an aircraft<n>gains speed to lift up and
into the sky.<n>Also implied is that it maintains its<n>ascending
trajectory.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Mayano, do you mean to say you<n>wish for Oguri to fly?
But... by what<n>means? And how does that solve our<n>star
dilemma?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Cool your jets, Hayahide! ☆ The<n>marvelous thing we found
is... a giant<n>sleigh!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: A sleigh...

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Wooow! That's super awesome! And<n>we just saw a giant
sleigh that<n>crashed down!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: ...Oh! The one you mentioned!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, that one! Seemed like it was still<n>airworthy, so we
pulled it on over! ☆

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Aha. Your idea is to use that sleigh to<n>haul the star back
here. I'm not sure<n>what that has to do with taking off<n>
though...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Ah! But that solves our problem.<n>Okay, Mayano, where is it?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Wait right here! Me and Marvey will<n>get it ready!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hold on a moment! Do you seriously<n>intend to do this,
Oguri? Transportation<n>issue solved or not, there's still the<n>
matter of the blizzard.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
This isn't enough to assure your<n>fans. You really should
reconsider!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
But... if I don't do this, I'm not being<n>true to... the person
they admire...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Wha...

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
My fans like me because I win in the<n>hardest races. So how
can I back<n>down... when it really counts?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
They don't cheer for me just<n>because. They do it because I
never<n>change who I am. So I'm going to<n>make them
proud... one more time.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text: Oguri, you...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm really trying to take your feelings<n>into account. I want
nothing more than<n>a miracle to happen and the snow to<n>
stop...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Then why don't you make amiracle happen, Hayahide?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Wh-what do you mean?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
You're always thinking up a storm<n>over how to solve
problems. I bet you<n>already figured this out... You're just<n>
not sayin' it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I know you want to help her. So be<n>honest and spit it out,
would ya?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's rather odd for you to be<n>explaining things to me. But
you're<n>correct. I may have a way to raise her<n>chance of
success, but I can't—

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Oh, come on! I know you can do it, so<n>just do it! You're
tellin' me you can<n>trust Ticket but not me?!

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
And... all of us fans here want this<n>too! Please, Oguri! Help
us get the star!

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
Today isn't just any old holiday<n>party. We wanted to get
you out of the<n>slump you've been in.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
But to tell the truth... Maybe some<n>small part of us was
satisfied just to<n>watch you run.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
Even satisfied to see you lose, so<n>long as we could keep
cheering for<n>you. You've already inspired the best<n>in
us—maybe we became too content<n>with that.

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
So if you say you can do it... we'll<n>trust in you no matter
what! We're<n>your fans because you take on the<n>biggest
challenges after all!

text_block_list.name: Head Fan
text_block_list.text:
Tell us the safest way possible to do<n>it! Taishin believes that
you can figure<n>this out, so... we believe in you too!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Goodness, what a responsibility... But<n>all right. Oguri, I trust
that your legs are<n>up for this?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text:
Yes! I... Of course! My legs are why<n>everybody likes me. I
have full<n>confidence.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Then we'll plan this fully intending to<n>traverse deep
snowfall. I need to<n>confirm something quickly with the<n>
cabin manager.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Here I go!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Fans
text_block_list.text: Be careful, Oguri! Stay safe, okay?!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Hey, it's a message from Oguri! She<n>says she made it to
the bottom!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Ah... That's good to hear. All that<n>remains is to secure the
star and<n>come back up the path.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text:
Hayahide, you're so cool how you<n>came up with that idea!
☆ There's no<n>way she'll get lost if she follows the<n>
ropeway!

text_block_list.name: Oguri Fans
text_block_list.text: I hope she's okay... If anyone can do<n>it, it's her.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
...Mayano, Marvelous. I wish to<n>borrow your creative
powers. Can you<n>think of any way to ease the minds of<n>
her fans?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Hold it. I... might have an idea.<n>Hayahide, be Santa for a
while.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: ...Pardon?

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Wooow! You look simplymarvelous! ☆★

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Uh, are you certain? I don't appear<n>strange like this? Ugh, I
think my<n>headpiece is falling off!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Don't worry, I put it on tight. Yeah,<n>lookin' good. It's a good
thing I<n>helped with the design. If Ticket went<n>with her first
idea, you'd be wearing a<n>beard right now.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: But, Taishin, this...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Uh, well... It was actually supposed to<n>be a surprise from
Ticket. But it's her<n>bad for being late.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
You're always thinking about me and<n>Ticket... never
yourself. That's why<n>she thought you'd be perfect for<n>
this... Get it?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
But, you know... It's a big deal to be<n>Santa. So maybe you
could just be<n>happy like all us fools for once, you<n>dummy.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Thank you, Taishin... You're right. I<n>can't deny myself the
joy of<n>receiving such a wonderful gift.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Now it's my turn to take the limelight.<n>I'm sorry, Oguri, but... I
have to steal<n>all of your fans for a bit.

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text:
Your hair's so big and fluffy! It's<n>just like Santa's beard! I
wanna<n>make a giant braid with it!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
What?! Did someone just suggest<n>that my head is large?! I
am merely<n>accentuating my frizzy hair for the<n>occasion!

text_block_list.name: Children
text_block_list.text: Run backwards now! Yeah, Santa<n>lady! It'll be awesome!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Hah, this is going great. Everyone's<n>so into you. Well?
Don't leave your<n>fans hanging.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Ergh! Fine, but I will only do this once!<n>...Please, Oguri. Come
back quickly!
